title: Library Jobs: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Contact us: Our staff: Thank you for your interest in employment at Northwestern University Libraries. Positions range from hourly-wage student jobs to full-time staff and professional librarian positions. Browse employment opportunities and apply for: Information about onboarding, required paperwork and more can be found in the following guides: Northwestern University is an Equal Opportunity, Affirmative Action Employer of all protected classes, including veterans and individuals with disabilities. Women, racial and ethnic minorities, individuals with disabilities, and veterans are encouraged to apply. Hiring is contingent upon eligibility to work in the United States.
